TO ALL THOSE PPL GETTING "NO LANGUAGES FOUND" I got that same message too and I finally got it to work...
At first I opened the .iso with ISObuster and extracted files and installed. After which i started the program and ran the program, which was when i got that same message. 
So after i uninstalled and ran the .iso in a virtual drive, such as with the Alcohol120% tool, and run the installation from there...it should be fine when you start the program. Hope this helps

For the elevated rights issue

HIT WINDOW-E
RIGHT CLICK THE DISC  AND SELECT EXPLORE
RIGHT CLICK AUTO-RUN
SELECT RUN AS ADMIN

ENJOY!

hey can anyone give me a simple step by step of hot ot get this installed on my computer please? :)

thanks

davetherave88:
1) Extract the file using PowerIso, Magic ISO Maker or any other software
2) Install the software
4) Reboot
5) Mount the ISO file (the one you downloaded) onto a virtual drive using the above software or burn it onto a CD

If you burned a CD: Insert the CD
If you mounted it onto a virtual drive: Don't do anything

6) Have fun!

Chipmunks are a pain the only way i found to get rid of them was to take a 1: 5 gallon bucket and fill it up to about half full of water. then get a 2: big bag og sunfower seeds srinkle them over the water so it looks solid run a 3: 1 x 1 across the top and 4: set it out where your chipmunks are. you get two or 3 a day in a week the problem is over.

the "Chipmunk problem is probally due to the program not interfacing well with your sound card with the initial settings.  One way to fix it is to open up your volume control and play with the sliders till it sounds right, Im still downloading it but if you look in the program there is most likely a menu for manipulating the sound output as well.  Remeber you cant "break" your computer with most software so just play with stuff to get it right.  Ill check it after I get it and install it and give you an update.
